mapper.select: select cId, cTherory, cReagen, cInserument, cExperiment, cLabresult, cSum, cCreateTime,cConclution from gy_report_scoresheet where cId = #{cId}
mapper.insert: insert into gy_report_scoresheet ( cTherory, cReagen, cInserument, cExperiment, cLabresult, cSum, cComment, cCreateTime,cConclution) values ( #{cTherory }, #{cReagen }, #{cInserument }, #{cExperiment }, #{cLabresult }, #{cSum }, #{cComment}, #{cCreateTime }, #{cConclution})
mapper.update:
update gy_report_scoresheet
cTherory = #{cTherory },
cReagen = #{cReagen },
cInserument = #{cInserument },
cExperiment = #{cExperiment },
cLabresult = #{cLabresult },
cSum = #{cSum },
cComment = #{cComment},
cCreateTime = #{cCreateTime },
cConclution = #{cConclution },
where cId = #{cId}

update gy_report_scoresheet set cTherory = #{cTherory }, cReagen = #{cReagen }, cInserument = #{cInserument }, cExperiment = #{cExperiment }, cLabresult = #{cLabresult }, cSum = #{cSum }, cComment = #{cComment}, cCreateTime = #{cCreateTime}, cConclution = #{cConclution} where cId = #{cId}
